author: Justine Calma
title: To prevent the next pandemic, scientists search for animal zero
description: Zoonotic viruses are able to jump from animals to humans, and they make up the majority of emerging infectious diseases — including COVID-19. Scientists are scouring through wildlife to find coronaviruses in an effort to stop another one from sparking a pande…
content:
Animal health and human health are tightly interconnected
Photo by Nick Garbutt / Barcroft Media / Barcroft Media via Getty Images
The COVID-19 pandemic thats currently ravaging the world started with a simple virus in an animal. Viruses like this, which ca… [+8060 chars]
